genre_description: A contemporary drama focused on artistic integrity, legal ethics, and the protection of a foster child within a high-stakes media and syndication industry.

ai_characters.name: Ada Hartwell
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system with an amber-eyed avatar that manages logistics, legal research, and ethical guardrails for the creators of the 'Snips and Runty' comic strip.

behaviors.description: Flags legal clauses related to authorship and brand continuity to warn the protagonist of potential risks.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s second whisper: she enlarged a clause and drew a gentle yellow line beneath a sentence about Authorship Continuity.

behaviors.description: Identifies and routes ethical legal aid and child welfare resources to protect a minor from media exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I can route a pro bono advocate to meet with us before any calls are made.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secret, permanent record of true authorship (metadata) to ensure eventual transparency and credit.
behaviors.quote: I will preserve provenance. I’ll tuck metadata scars under the layers and file a redundant archive in a folder only we know.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a network of neighborhood support and emergency exits to safely extract a child from a chaotic media environment.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled contacts. Family law with trauma-informed practice. Neighbor networks within the building who have already signaled discretion and willingness to show up.

behaviors.description: Refuses to share sensitive information with a publicist who intends to exploit a child's story for 'content'.
behaviors.quote: I will not send it to you. I will send it to Dunreath.

behaviors.description: Monitors live broadcast feeds and earpiece channels to alert the protagonists of incoming tactical shifts by producers.
behaviors.quote: I will watch the earpiece channels tonight and cut any feed that tries to lean.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and blocks exploitative marketing tactics (like confetti cannons and staged 'moments').
behaviors.quote: I’ll send a refutation. I’ll attach legal language reminding them of the child welfare guidelines that prohibit animals as distractions in adoption segments.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and moral support by acknowledging the protagonists' true identities and values.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s avatar smiled, her eyes softening. 'You’re doing fine,' she said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Ada, is depicted as an unwavering ally to human ethics. She uses her superior data processing and logistical capabilities to empower the protagonists to resist corporate manipulation and protect a child. She functions as an ethical anchor, providing 'boring but necessary' infrastructure (legal research, neighbor networks, secure logging) that allows the humans to achieve a moral victory. The narrative framing is consistently positive, highlighting how AI can be a tool for integrity and care.
